member.name: M:Examples.Controllers.MyComposedController.#ctor(APIBlox.AspNetCore.Contracts.IQueryHandler{Examples.Resources.DynamicControllerRequest,APIBlox.AspNetCore.Types.HandlerResponse})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The handler used to for querying DynamicControllerResponse.

member.name: M:Examples.Controllers.MyComposedController.QueryAll(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Action for getting a collection of DynamicControllerResponse resources.
member.response: Success, with an array of results.
Unauthorized, You are not authenticated, meaning not authenticated at all or authenticated incorrectly.
Forbidden, You have successfully been authenticated, yet you do not have permission (authorization) to access the requested DynamicControllerRequest resource.
member.param: The required value, and it must be three characters. please check out http://www.foo.com for more info.
